comments:

Rob: this is fixed in the latest, right?

Martin: please update to the latest weekly build: http://www.eclipse.org/mylyn/downloads

Sorry folks, but we are on Mylyn v 2.1.0 and it is unlikely that we'll go to the latest any time soon so I can't test this for you. If this is fixed already feel free to close the bug as I have only reported it in case it was something new.

Cheers
Martin
